title: Watermelon and goat cheese salad
ingredients: ['500g watermelon, cut into small slices', '180g fresh goat cheese, cut into 12 slices', 'grated zest of 1 orange', 'For the dressing', '2 tablespoons freshly squeezed orange juice', '1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice', '3 tablespoons good quality olive oil', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
